description: Stores a chronological log of recent perceptible events witnessed by or occurring around the entity. Used to provide context and a summary of recent happenings.

maxEntries.description: The maximum number of log entries to retain. Older entries are discarded when this limit is exceeded.

logEntries.description: An ordered list of perceived event details. Newest entries are typically added to the end or beginning depending on desired retrieval order.

eventId.description: A unique ID for this specific log entry or the originating perceptible event instance (if available and useful for deduplication or correlation).

descriptionText.description: The human-readable summary of the event.

perceptionType.description: The category of the perceived event.

actorId.description: The ID of the entity that caused the event.

targetId.description: Optional. The ID of the primary target of the event.
